amendment.description: Amendment sought to designate the Coastal Plain of the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge as wilderness and a part of the National Wilderness Preservation System.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 16 printed in House Report 114-429 to designate the Coastal Plain of the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge as wilderness and a part of the National Wilderness Preservation System.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Huffman amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 227 (Roll no. 99).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Huffman amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 227 (Roll no. 99).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. Huffman.
